title: Ross Stores: The Secret To Continued Long-Term Success
text: Ross Stores is a highly attractive business with consistently strong distributions, earnings growth, and the potential for strong future returns through its incredible business model. The company boasts two strong brands, a diverse array of desirable products, healthy store growth, and a loyal customer demographic, creating shareholder value in the years to come. Ross Stores' off-price model and unique shopping experience insulate it from the impact of e-commerce and department store closures.
